content.prompt: In context, the phrase “blood-warm runnel of ink” (paragraph 2, sentence 3) most clearly conveys

choices.label: the author’s anxieties about being different from his classmates
the obstacles that the author encountered in learning English
the vitality of the author’s relationship with language
the author’s prioritization of speech over writing

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
